Bash("$VENV_PYTHON" -c "
import requests
from config import BIRDEYE_API_KEY, BIRDEYE_API_URL, BIRDEYE_CHAIN

# Test BirdEye holder endpoint
address = ''6p6xgHyF7AeE6TZkSmFsko444wqoP15icUSqi2jfGiPN''  # TRUMP
endpoint = f''{BIRDEYE_API_URL.rstrip\(""/""\)}/defi/token_holder''
headers = {
    ''X-API-KEY'': BIRDEYE_API_KEY,
    ''x-chain'': BIRDEYE_CHAIN,
}

resp = requests.get\(endpoint, headers=headers, params={''address'': address}, timeout=15\)
print\(f''Status: {resp.status_code}''\)
if resp.status_code == 200:
    data = resp.json\(\)
    print\(''Holder data available:''\)
    import json
    print\(json.dumps\(data, indent=2\)[:1000]\)
else:
    print\(f''Error: {resp.text[:500]}''\)
")

Bash("$VENV_PYTHON" -c "
import requests
from config import BIRDEYE_API_KEY, BIRDEYE_API_URL, BIRDEYE_CHAIN

# Try the token overview endpoint
address = ''6p6xgHyF7AeE6TZkSmFsko444wqoP15icUSqi2jfGiPN''  
endpoint = f''{BIRDEYE_API_URL.rstrip\(""/""\)}/defi/token_overview''
headers = {
    ''X-API-KEY'': BIRDEYE_API_KEY,
    ''x-chain'': BIRDEYE_CHAIN,
}

resp = requests.get\(endpoint, headers=headers, params={''address'': address}, timeout=15\)
print\(f''Status: {resp.status_code}''\)
if resp.status_code == 200:
    data = resp.json\(\)
    import json
    print\(json.dumps\(data, indent=2\)[:2000]\)
else:
    print\(f''Error: {resp.text[:500]}''\)
")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive Solana memecoin engine with elite scoring and portfolio management

Major features:
- Elite 7-component scoring system \(BirdEye enrichment, lifecycle detection, exit signals\)
- Portfolio management with UI \(buy/sell tracking, PnL, interactive Telegram UI\)
- Good Buy feature with watch alerts and instant token evaluation
- Parallel portfolio scanners \(sell scanner, reentry scanner, runner watchlist\)
- Pattern detection system with technical analysis
- Mindshare/narrative tracking with regime awareness
- Conviction scoring with market feature analysis

New modules:
- portfolio/: Full portfolio state management, pricing, alerts, snapshot generation
- signals/elite/: Elite scoring with anti-manipulation, execution risk, performance
- signals/conviction/: Conviction scoring engine with market features
- signals/mindshare/: Narrative tracking and regime detection
- signals/pattern_system/: Technical pattern detection \(wedge, flag, cup-and-handle\)
- tests/: Comprehensive test suite \(36 tests passing\)

Core improvements:
- BirdEye API integration with rate limiting and error handling
- Solana-only token filtering \(DEXSCREENER_CHAIN_ID=solana\)
- Status screen with data sources, scanners, portfolio metrics, alert budget
- Tools menu with Good Buy evaluation and watch management
- Error handling in runner watchlist scanner
- Removed duplicate Runner Scout UI button
- Configuration visibility in Status screen

Technical details:
- All tests passing \(36/36\)
- Safe .gitignore protecting state files and secrets
- Position sizing utilities
- Database helpers for state persistence
- Message formatting and consolidation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
